lead_paragraph: DWORKIN--Peter L. 4/21/49 - 1/29/2015 Our Beloved Dad, brilliant, fascinating and utterly hilarious. You left us too soon. Always in our hearts, Natalie, Sam, Max & Rachel 1/3
